title: Math Blaster 2 Homeschool Educational
description:

Please check out my other homeschool torrents at www.thepiratebay.se.user/cezen.

I am the ONLY current uploader of Homeschool torrents... But I would love to one of many... homeschool is a COMPLETELY neglected category.

Math Blaster 2 is the sequel to the fun, educational, and not to mention successful Math Blaster. The game is set in a fun Sci-Fi, futuristic world in which you are in space trying to defeat the mean enemies, while solving puzzles, and of course, learning Math the fun way. (Its sure beats the old fashioned Textbook :) )

The program works on basic math and puzzle skills by creating a futuristic space adventure that can only be won through the power of Math. Math Blaster 2 is good for children 6-12 years old.

I recommend this game, because it will teach your children (or if you are a child, it will teach you) math by using a fun Sci-FI theme that will make your child (or you) want to learn more and more, and it almost never gets boring.

For Windows/Mac

Brief description of this software product:
Blasternaut and his pals play 4 different games in order to build the city. Math Problems are changeable to +,-,*,/, fractions, decimals, negatives and 2 and 3 operand formulas.

This program is appropriate for the following age groups:
Elementary School

Type of software:
Software that Educates
Software that Entertains

Kids will learn the following skills:
Math, quick thinking
